foreignData.name: Abkömmling Masumaros
foreignData.text: Lege zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments für jede Karte auf deiner Hand eine +1/+1-Marke auf den Abkömmling Masumaros und entferne dann eine +1/+1-Marke vom Abkömmling Masumaros für jede Karte auf der Hand eines Gegners deiner Wahl.

foreignData.name: Descendiente de Masumaro
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre el Descendiente de Masumaro por cada carta en tu mano, luego remueve un contador +1/+1 del Descendiente de Masumaro por cada carta en la mano del oponente objetivo.

foreignData.name: Descendant de Masumaro
foreignData.text: Au début de votre entretien, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur le Descendant de Masumaro pour chaque carte dans votre main, puis retirez un marqueur +1/+1 du Descendant de Masumaro pour chaque carte dans la main de l'adversaire ciblé.

foreignData.name: Discendente di Masumaro
foreignData.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, metti un segnalino +1/+1 sul Discendente di Masumaro per ogni carta che hai in mano, quindi rimuovi un segnalino +1/+1 dal Discendente di Masumaro per ogni carta che l'avversario bersaglio ha in mano.

foreignData.name: 増麻呂の末裔
foreignData.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、対戦相手１人を対象とする。あなたの手札にあるカードの枚数に等しい個数の＋１/＋１カウンターを増麻呂の末裔の上に置き、その後そのプレイヤーの手札にあるカードの枚数に等しい個数の＋１/＋１カウンターを増麻呂の末裔の上から取り除く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・モンク

foreignData.name: Descendente de Masumaro
foreignData.text: No início de sua manutenção, coloque um marcador +1/+1 em Descendente de Masumaro para cada card em sua mão, depois remova um marcador +1/+1 de Descendente de Masumaro para cada card na mão do oponente alvo.

foreignData.name: 增麻吕后裔
foreignData.text: 在你的维持开始时，你每有一张手牌，便在增麻吕后裔上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后目标对手每有一张手牌，便从增麻吕后裔上移去一个+1/+1指示物。

name: Descendant of Masumaro
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.

rulings.text: Descendant of Masumaro’s printed power and toughness is 1/1, so removing all the +1/+1 counters usually doesn’t reduce the creature’s toughness to 0.
The counters are added and then removed without a pause for priority or state-based actions being checked in between.
All +1/+1 counters on Descendant of Masumaro are removed, including those put on it by other effects.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.
